mapper.select: SELECT productNum, productName, price, companyName, description, productImage, p_parentCategory, p_categoryNum FROM product
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET productName = #{productName}, price = #{price}, companyName = #{companyName}, description = #{description}, productImage = #{productImage}, p_parentCategory = #{p_parentCategory}, p_categoryNum = #{p_categoryNum} WHERE productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productNum, productName, price, companyName, description, productImage, p_parentCategory, p_categoryNum) VALUES (product_seq.nextval, #{productName}, #{price}, #{companyName}, #{description}, #{productImage}, #{p_parentCategory}, #{p_categoryNum})
